application_details.project_description: The first Web3 game based on the global hit animated IP, Larva
application_details.program_description:
🦄 DISCOVER THE NEXT KILLER APP WITH ETHEREUM AT EthCC!





🚨 FIRST STEP: Register on Luma 🚨 Before submitting your project, you MUST register for our showcase event: 👉 https://lu.ma/ethcc-showcase

This Luma registration is REQUIRED for all applicants - make sure to complete it first!



Are you ready to showcase your project at EthCC, Europe's largest Ethereum-focused event in the stunning French Riviera?



Submit your product to the EthCC Builders Showcase now and secure your spot on the main stage! EthCC brings together top developers, leading projects, investors, and thought leaders from around the world—this is your chance to shine and shape the future of Ethereum.



This is your opportunity to showcase your project to builders, investors, media, and ecosystem partners from across the globe at Europe's premier Ethereum event. The showcase will take place at the EthCC Main Venue (Chaplin Stage, 5th floor) during the main event, providing all builders with an unparalleled opportunity to gain exposure to the ecosystem.



You will find everything you need to take your project to the next level on the main stage of EthCC.🔥


🤝Your Showcase Opportunity
EthCC Builders Showcase - Live Demo Pitch Competition



Format: Cross-ecosystem builder showcase — Ethereum-aligned and open to all innovators



Structure: 5 rounds, each led by a featured ecosystem partner



Per Round: 3 top projects do a live demo pitch (4 minutes each)



Judging: Top-tier VCs, leading KOLs, and live EthCC audience voting



Prize Pool: $10,000 in showcase prizes + $3,000 in audience rewards

🏆 The top team from the live demo pitch will receive a $10,000 prize!

💸 Audience members who vote for the winning team will share a $3,000 prize pool!




🧑🏻‍💻Who Can Apply?
EVERYONE building on Ethereum! There are no strict restrictions - we welcome builders at ALL stages:



・Idea stage - Have a concept? We want to hear it!

・MVP/Prototype - Perfect for getting feedback from top VCs

・Launched projects - Ready to scale? Show us your traction!

・Solo builders - Individual developers are highly encouraged

・Student teams - University projects welcome

・International teams - We provide travel support for selected projects



⚠️ Note: All selected finalists MUST attend and pitch in person at the EthCC venue. Online pitching is not accepted.



🎟 Finalists must arrange their own EthCC ticket and be at the venue 1 hour before the showcase begins.





🌍 Calling all builders worldwide - Don't let geography limit your dreams!

💡Why Apply?
🏆Compete for $10,000 in showcase prizes



✅ Pitch to top-tier investors and Web3 leaders at Europe's largest Ethereum event



✅ Get exposure to the global EthCC community



✅ Receive real-time feedback from experienced VC judges and KOLs



✅ Network with leading ecosystem partners: IoTeX, 0G Labs, Kaia



✅ Meet potential customers and partners from across the Ethereum ecosystem



✅ Gain media exposure at the most prestigious Ethereum event in Europe



and more!!


🎤 12 Demo Pitch Slots Available!
Selection Process: 12 projects will be selected through a first-round review conducted by our elite judges and the AKINDO team.



But we encourage EVERY Ethereum builder to submit! The more diverse and innovative submissions we receive, the stronger our showcase becomes.



Why submit even if you're not 100% ready?
・Selection criteria values potential and vision over polish

・Early-stage projects often surprise our judges the most

・Multiple evaluation rounds mean more opportunities to stand out

・Our team provides guidance and feedback to promising projects



📆 Finalists will be announced on June 26 (Thu).

📅 The live showcase will take place on July 2nd from 1:00–4:00 PM at EthCC’s main venue in Cannes. Finalists must arrive 1 hour before the session begins.



💡 Pro tip: Submit now and iterate later - you can update your submission until the deadline!



💡 Pro tip: Submit now and iterate later - you can update your submission until the deadline!



🌟 Ecosystem Partners
If you are building on any of these cutting-edge ecosystems, mention it in your submission comments. Each partner ecosystem will showcase their top 3 projects, increasing your chances of being selected!



IoTeX
​The DePIN and AI Infrastructure for Everyone｜Bridging the gap between decentralized physical infrastructure networks and AI technology.



Website: https://iotex.io/

X: https://x.com/iotex_io



0G Labs
The first decentralized AI operating system. The largest AI Layer 1 ecosystem. Infinitely scalable for AI. Performant for everyone. Bridge to 0G.

Website: https://0g.ai/

X: https://x.com/0g_labs



Kaia
​Kaia is an EVM Layer 1 public blockchain designed to bring Web3 to millions of users across Asia.

Website: https://www.kaia.io/

X: https://x.com/KaiaChain



and more...


🧭 Elite Judging Panel
Melody He - Managing Partner and Co-Founder, Spartan Group

https://x.com/melmelmelting



Kenneth Shek - Head of Projects, Animoca Brands



Jacky Chi - Co-Founder, SNZ



Olivier Galaud - General Partner, Everstake Capital

https://x.com/oliviergalaud



Ciara Sun - Founder and Managing Partner, C² Ventures

https://x.com/crypto_ciara



Joey Shin - Senior Investment Associate, IOSG Ventures

https://x.com/jshinny12



Geng Kai - Head of Researc ,DFG



Plus engaged EthCC audience voting🫵🏻


💰Audience Voting Bonus
$3,000 Prize Pool for Audience: Vote for your favorite project during the showcase—if you pick the 1st place winner, you'll share in the $3,000 prize pool with everyone who voted for that team!



🎯 Your vote could win you part of the $3,000 audience prize—and the top builder team will receive $10,000 live on stage!





📅 Showcase Schedule
3-Hour Program Structure: Coming Soon...



Venue: EthCC Main Venue (Chaplin Stage, 5th floor) Palais des Festivals et des Congrès de Cannes 1 Bd de la Croisette, 06400 Cannes, France



⚠️ Important: An EthCC ticket is required to enter the venue and attend this showcase. Finalists must arrange their own tickets.



Secure your EthCC ticket in advance: https://ethcc.io



Priority Selection Criteria:

✅ Projects already attending EthCC (higher selection priority)

✅ Projects building on our ecosystem partners (IoTeX, 0G Labs,Kaia)

✅ Innovation and potential impact

✅ Alignment with Ethereum's future



Support is provided based on availability and final selection. All selected projects will receive valuable exposure regardless of additional support.





🏄‍♂️ Submit Now - Every Submission Counts!
The more projects we receive, the stronger our showcase becomes!



Join the EthCC Builders Showcase now, create your project submission, and secure your spot on the main stage. This is an open opportunity for all Ethereum builders - no matter where you are in your journey.



✨ Why submit TODAY:
・FREE to apply - zero cost, maximum potential upside

・5-minute submission - quick and easy process

・Global reach - we're actively seeking diverse projects worldwide

・Multiple selection rounds - more submissions = more opportunities



Your project has the chance to shine on the main stage at Europe's premier Ethereum event. Are you ready to discover and showcase the next killer app? Every great project starts with a single submission - Apply now and grab this special opportunity!



Don't miss the most exciting showcase at EthCC - where the next generation of killer apps in the Ethereum ecosystem will be revealed.



🔥 SUBMIT YOUR PROJECT NOW - The deadline is approaching fast, and spots are filling up!



If you have any questions, please contact us on Telegram or Discord.



Telegram: https://t.me/akindo_io

Discord: https://discord.gg/xAHPkSM9t7





🤝 Calling Judges & Sponsors!
We're actively seeking:

Additional judges from leading VCs and Web3 organizations

Ecosystem sponsors to support our showcase

Media partners for enhanced coverage



Interested in joining our elite panel? Contact us at hey@akindo.io

Join the EthCC Builders Showcase now, create your project submission, and secure your spot on the main stage. This is an open opportunity for all Ethereum builders - no matter where you are in your journey.



✨ Why submit TODAY:
・FREE to apply - zero cost, maximum potential upside

・5-minute submission - quick and easy process

・Global reach - we're actively seeking diverse projects worldwide

・Multiple selection rounds - more submissions = more opportunities



Your project has the chance to shine on the main stage at Europe's premier Ethereum event. Are you ready to discover and showcase the next killer app? Every great project starts with a single submission - Apply now and grab this special opportunity!



Don't miss the most exciting showcase at EthCC - where the next generation of killer apps in the Ethereum ecosystem will be revealed.



🔥 SUBMIT YOUR PROJECT NOW - The deadline is approaching fast, and spots are filling up!



If you have any questions, please contact us on Telegram or Discord.



Telegram: https://t.me/akindo_io

Discord: https://discord.gg/xAHPkSM9t7





🤝 Calling Judges & Sponsors!
We're actively seeking:

Additional judges from leading VCs and Web3 organizations

Ecosystem sponsors to support our showcase

Media partners for enhanced coverage



Interested in joining our elite panel? Contact us at hey@akindo.io

🦄 DISCOVER THE NEXT KILLER APP WITH ETHEREUM AT EthCC!





🚨 FIRST STEP: Register on Luma 🚨 Before submitting your project, you MUST register for our showcase event: 👉 https://lu.ma/ethcc-showcase

This Luma registration is REQUIRED for all applicants - make sure to complete it first!



Are you ready to showcase your project at EthCC, Europe's largest Ethereum-focused event in the stunning French Riviera?



Submit your product to the EthCC Builders Showcase now and secure your spot on the main stage! EthCC brings together top developers, leading projects, investors, and thought leaders from around the world—this is your chance to shine and shape the future of Ethereum.



This is your opportunity to showcase your project to builders, investors, media, and ecosystem partners from across the globe at Europe's premier Ethereum event. The showcase will take place at the EthCC Main Venue (Chaplin Stage, 5th floor) during the main event, providing all builders with an unparalleled opportunity to gain exposure to the ecosystem.



You will find everything you need to take your project to the next level on the main stage of EthCC.🔥


🤝Your Showcase Opportunity
EthCC Builders Showcase - Live Demo Pitch Competition



Format: Cross-ecosystem builder showcase — Ethereum-aligned and open to all innovators



Structure: 5 rounds, each led by a featured ecosystem partner



Per Round: 3 top projects do a live demo pitch (4 minutes each)



Judging: Top-tier VCs, leading KOLs, and live EthCC audience voting



Prize Pool: $10,000 in showcase prizes + $3,000 in audience rewards

🏆 The top team from the live demo pitch will receive a $10,000 prize!

💸 Audience members who vote for the winning team will share a $3,000 prize pool!




🧑🏻‍💻Who Can Apply?
EVERYONE building on Ethereum! There are no strict restrictions - we welcome builders at ALL stages:



・Idea stage - Have a concept? We want to hear it!

・MVP/Prototype - Perfect for getting feedback from top VCs

・Launched projects - Ready to scale? Show us your traction!

・Solo builders - Individual developers are highly encouraged

・Student teams - University projects welcome

・International teams - We provide travel support for selected projects



⚠️ Note: All selected finalists MUST attend and pitch in person at the EthCC venue. Online pitching is not accepted.



🎟 Finalists must arrange their own EthCC ticket and be at the venue 1 hour before the showcase begins.





🌍 Calling all builders worldwide - Don't let geography limit your dreams!

💡Why Apply?
🏆Compete for $10,000 in showcase prizes



✅ Pitch to top-tier investors and Web3 leaders at Europe's largest Ethereum event



✅ Get exposure to the global EthCC community



✅ Receive real-time feedback from experienced VC judges and KOLs



✅ Network with leading ecosystem partners: IoTeX, 0G Labs, Kaia



✅ Meet potential customers and partners from across the Ethereum ecosystem



✅ Gain media exposure at the most prestigious Ethereum event in Europe



and more!!


🎤 12 Demo Pitch Slots Available!
Selection Process: 12 projects will be selected through a first-round review conducted by our elite judges and the AKINDO team.



But we encourage EVERY Ethereum builder to submit! The more diverse and innovative submissions we receive, the stronger our showcase becomes.



Why submit even if you're not 100% ready?
・Selection criteria values potential and vision over polish

・Early-stage projects often surprise our judges the most

・Multiple evaluation rounds mean more opportunities to stand out

・Our team provides guidance and feedback to promising projects



📆 Finalists will be announced on June 26 (Thu).

📅 The live showcase will take place on July 2nd from 1:00–4:00 PM at EthCC’s main venue in Cannes. Finalists must arrive 1 hour before the session begins.



💡 Pro tip: Submit now and iterate later - you can update your submission until the deadline!



💡 Pro tip: Submit now and iterate later - you can update your submission until the deadline!



🌟 Ecosystem Partners
If you are building on any of these cutting-edge ecosystems, mention it in your submission comments. Each partner ecosystem will showcase their top 3 projects, increasing your chances of being selected!



IoTeX
​The DePIN and AI Infrastructure for Everyone｜Bridging the gap between decentralized physical infrastructure networks and AI technology.



Website: https://iotex.io/

X: https://x.com/iotex_io



0G Labs
The first decentralized AI operating system. The largest AI Layer 1 ecosystem. Infinitely scalable for AI. Performant for everyone. Bridge to 0G.

Website: https://0g.ai/

X: https://x.com/0g_labs



Kaia
​Kaia is an EVM Layer 1 public blockchain designed to bring Web3 to millions of users across Asia.

Website: https://www.kaia.io/

X: https://x.com/KaiaChain



and more...


🧭 Elite Judging Panel
Melody He - Managing Partner and Co-Founder, Spartan Group

https://x.com/melmelmelting



Kenneth Shek - Head of Projects, Animoca Brands



Jacky Chi - Co-Founder, SNZ



Olivier Galaud - General Partner, Everstake Capital

https://x.com/oliviergalaud



Ciara Sun - Founder and Managing Partner, C² Ventures

https://x.com/crypto_ciara



Joey Shin - Senior Investment Associate, IOSG Ventures

https://x.com/jshinny12



Geng Kai - Head of Researc ,DFG



Plus engaged EthCC audience voting🫵🏻


💰Audience Voting Bonus
$3,000 Prize Pool for Audience: Vote for your favorite project during the showcase—if you pick the 1st place winner, you'll share in the $3,000 prize pool with everyone who voted for that team!



🎯 Your vote could win you part of the $3,000 audience prize—and the top builder team will receive $10,000 live on stage!





📅 Showcase Schedule
3-Hour Program Structure: Coming Soon...



Venue: EthCC Main Venue (Chaplin Stage, 5th floor) Palais des Festivals et des Congrès de Cannes 1 Bd de la Croisette, 06400 Cannes, France



⚠️ Important: An EthCC ticket is required to enter the venue and attend this showcase. Finalists must arrange their own tickets.



Secure your EthCC ticket in advance: https://ethcc.io



Priority Selection Criteria:

✅ Projects already attending EthCC (higher selection priority)

✅ Projects building on our ecosystem partners (IoTeX, 0G Labs,Kaia)

✅ Innovation and potential impact

✅ Alignment with Ethereum's future



Support is provided based on availability and final selection. All selected projects will receive valuable exposure regardless of additional support.





🏄‍♂️ Submit Now - Every Submission Counts!
The more projects we receive, the stronger our showcase becomes!



Join the EthCC Builders Showcase now, create your project submission, and secure your spot on the main stage. This is an open opportunity for all Ethereum builders - no matter where you are in your journey.



✨ Why submit TODAY:
・FREE to apply - zero cost, maximum potential upside

・5-minute submission - quick and easy process

・Global reach - we're actively seeking diverse projects worldwide

・Multiple selection rounds - more submissions = more opportunities



Your project has the chance to shine on the main stage at Europe's premier Ethereum event. Are you ready to discover and showcase the next killer app? Every great project starts with a single submission - Apply now and grab this special opportunity!



Don't miss the most exciting showcase at EthCC - where the next generation of killer apps in the Ethereum ecosystem will be revealed.



🔥 SUBMIT YOUR PROJECT NOW - The deadline is approaching fast, and spots are filling up!



If you have any questions, please contact us on Telegram or Discord.



Telegram: https://t.me/akindo_io

Discord: https://discord.gg/xAHPkSM9t7





🤝 Calling Judges & Sponsors!
We're actively seeking:

Additional judges from leading VCs and Web3 organizations

Ecosystem sponsors to support our showcase

Media partners for enhanced coverage



Interested in joining our elite panel? Contact us at hey@akindo.io
